participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Thoughtful and conscientious, Emily cares about her health and the environment.
participant_1.background: I am vegan. My father is a mechanic. I am leaving for college in three months. I work at Walmart as a stocker.

participant_2.name: Max
participant_2.personality: Quirky and imaginative, Max has a playful approach to life and enjoys unique hobbies.
participant_2.background: My cat's name is Leroy Jenkins. I wish I had a real dragon I could train. I enjoy playing retro video games on my 386. My suspenders sometimes make my shoulders hurt.
